title: ACURE Conditioner Leave in Argan Oil + Argan Stem Cell
description: Acure Organics - Leave-In Conditioner Argan Oil + Argan Stem Cell - 4 oz. (118 ml) Acure Organics Leave-In Conditioner Argan Oil + Argan Stem Cell is powered with Moroccan argan oil and argan stem cells. It is designed to protect hair at the cellular level. Argan stem cells help strengthen the root bulb, while argan oil provides body and shine to each hair follicle. Spray in leave in conditioner for an all-day weightless yet moisturizing protection that makes your hair feel manageable and moisturized Acure Organics is a family owned and operated company founded on sustainable principles to provide the highest quality fair trade, natural and certified organic personal care products. Their products are created with great care and are a reflection of their values. Each of their products is free from animal testing, parabens, sulfates, phthalates, synthetic fragrances, harmful preservatives and artificial colors. They travel the globe to find the most potent certified organic ingredients that meet their high standards of efficacy and purity. They thank you for sharing in their mission to have a positive impact on the world we live in. They like to believe that they create the purest, natural and organic plant-based skincare products. Simplicity is the key to their formulas. In keeping each ingredient as close to its natural state as possible, they feel that their products deliver visible, more potent results. Each decision they make is based upon their three guiding principles: Acure For Your SkinHigh quality skin care made from the purest, fair trade, natural and certified organic ingredients.Acure For Your PlanetThey have a sustainable company culture that impacts every decision they make. Each day, women are bombarded by harmful chemicals in cosmetic products.

title: Shea Butter - Molivera Organics 16 Oz. Premium Raw Unrefined African Organic Grade A Ivory Shea Butter for Natural Skin Care, Hair Care and Body Butters - 100% Pure and Double Filtered - Great for Acne, Stretch Marks, Eczema Etc - Great for Daily Moisturizer and For DIY Recipes - Karite SheaButter From Ghana - UV Resistant BPA Free Jar - 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
description:
IT SEEMS INCREDIBLE THAT ONE EXOTIC NUT CAN TREAT SO MANY OF THE BEAUTY WOES WE DEAL WITH EVERYDAY.Which of these common skin or hair issues do you need the remedy for?- Dry, cracked skin, heels, lips?
- Wrinkles, fine lines?
- Stretch marks, scars, blemishes, acne, eczema, rosacea, psoriasis?
- Dry cracked nails, cuticles? 
- Dry, dehydrated, frizzy, unruly, or brittle hair?
- Minor cuts, burns, sunburn, diaper rash?
- Natural sun block?IMAGINE FINALLY FINDING YOUR GO-TO BEAUTY PRODUCT IN MOLIVERA ORGANICS RAW AFRICAN IVORY SHEA BUTTER -Our butter is unrefined, meaning it has not gone through a chemical extraction process that overheats and bleaches the butter leaving it with less of its healing properties. Our butter is pure ivory. Yellow Shea butter can be a sign that the butter has more impurities or that coloring has been added. Because our butter is so pure, its softer, has a light nutty scent, and is never gritty, as you may sometimes find with others. Shea butter is ultra healing because it has high contents of antioxidants, essential fatty acids, vitamins A, D, E, and F, and UV ray protection.We send you our butter in a UV protective bottle. Exposure to light can degrade the butters natural properties. Our bottle helps to keep out light and keep the healing properties strong. Our butter is sealed in our controlled environment and will come to you just as you see it. It will not come yellow, rancid, gritty, or in a zip lock bag-like some others.IT'S A SHAME FOR YOU NOT TO REAP THE BENEFITS OF THIS NATURAL BEAUTY SERUM, WHEN IT HAS BEEN USED BY MILLIONS FOR CENTURIES.We guarantee you will be 100% satisfied and in love with your new skin or your money back.SO, EMPTY OUT YOUR BEAUTY CABINET, AND ADD MOLIVERA ORGANICS RAW AFRICAN IVORY SHEA BUTTER TO YOUR CART NOW AND 
ENJOY BEING IN YOUR OWN SKIN.
